subject: New York City Marathon
Tennis
New York City Marathon
Running
lead_paragraph: The tennis star Caroline Wozniacki, who was planning a November wedding with the golfer Rory McIlroy until he broke off their engagement, will run in New York on Nov. 2.
snippet: The tennis star Caroline Wozniacki, who was planning a November wedding with the golfer Rory McIlroy until he broke off their engagement, will run in New York on Nov. 2.
